name: 2 Arrows
description:
Armed with a magical bow and two arrows, a rogue archer is trying to infiltrate an evil empire that usurped the long-standing king and destroyed all the farmland in his village. In order to take back the kingdom, you must jump through the forest and into the sieged castle.  

Your magic precision aim makes it so that as you draw your bow, time slows down. Shoot targets that move walls and collect your arrows to solve difficult platforming puzzles.

First level available. Early in-progress test.
